message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11000. This is a competitive price considering its worth to you is $10000. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $10500. I hope this aligns better with my budget while still offering you a fair return for your item.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $10800. This price still reflects the value I place on the product, but I'm willing to compromise to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

I appreciate your offer, Alice. It shows your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget and the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $10600. I hope this offers a fair compromise for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence in finding a mutually beneficial agreement. After careful consideration, I'm willing to make one final concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $10700. This price is as close as I'm willing to go, but I believe it still reflects the value I place on the product.
